name: Wait
description: Suspends the process for the specified amount of time
author: Daniel Schroeder

inputs.name: Value
inputs.label: Value
inputs.helpMarkDown: The number of milliseconds/seconds/minutes to suspend the process for. Must be an integer greater than zero.

inputs.name: Unit
inputs.label: Unit
inputs.helpMarkDown: The units (milliseconds, seconds, or minutes) the Value corresponds to.
